sourmashconsumr 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    check_and_edit_names_in_signatures_df()
    Check for missing name, NAs in name, or empty name in a data frame of signatures
    check_compare_df_sample_col_and_move_to_rowname()
    Internal function to check if the sample name is a column or a rowname and move it to a rowname if it is a column.
    check_file_and_url_one()
    Check if local file path or URL are valid
    check_uniform_parameters_in_signatures_df()
    Check uniformity in sketch parameters
    from_gather_to_upset_df()
    Convert a data frame containing sourmash gather results into a upset plot compatible data frame
    from_list_to_upset_df()
    Convert a list of vectors into an upset plot-compatible data.frame while conserving value names as row.names
    from_signatures_to_rarefaction_df()
    Create a tidy data.frame representing per-sample rarefaction information
    from_signatures_to_upset_df()
    Convert a data.frame containing hashes from many sourmash signatures into a upset plot compatible data.frame
    from_taxonomy_annotate_to_count_table()
    Transform the output of sourmash taxonomy annotate into a phyloseq OTU table (count table)
    from_taxonomy_annotate_to_metacoder()
    Transform the output of sourmash taxonomy annotate into a taxmap metacoder object
    from_taxonomy_annotate_to_multi_strains()
    Detect whether multiple strains of the same species are present in a sample.
    from_taxonomy_annotate_to_phyloseq()
    Transform the output of sourmash taxonomy annotate into a phyloseq object
    from_taxonomy_annotate_to_tax_table()
    Transform the output of sourmash taxonomy annotate into a phyloseq tax table
    from_taxonomy_annotate_to_upset_inputs()
    Transform a taxonomy annotate data frame into an upset plot compliant data frame
    from_upset_df_to_intersection_members()
    Extract the lineages that underlie the intersections in an upset plot
    from_upset_df_to_intersection_summary()
    Summarize the size of intersections between samples in an upset compliant data frame
    from_upset_df_to_intersections()
    Transform an upset compliant data frame into a data frame of intersection names and lineages
    get_scaled_for_max_hash()
    Calculate the scaled value for a signature from the max_hash value
    gut_compare_df
    Gut microbiome sourmash compare data frame
    gut_gather_df
    Gut microbiome sourmash gather data frame
    gut_signatures_df
    Gut microbiome sourmash signatures data frame
    gut_taxonomy_annotate_df
    Gut microbiome sourmash taxonomy annotate data frame
    make_agglom_cols()
    Helper function to define column names for taxonomy agglomeration
    make_compare_mds()
    Perform an MDS analysis from a sourmash compare output and produce a tidy data.frame
    make_expression()
    Make an expression vector for italicizing a subset of a vector
    pivot_wider_taxonomy_annotate()
    Pivot sourmash_taxonomy_results to wide format
    plot_compare_heatmap()
    Plot a heatmap from a tibble of sourmash compare results.
    plot_compare_mds()
    Plot an MDS data.frame produced from the output of sourmash compare
    plot_gather_classified()
    Visualize the classified and unclassified fraction of many samples using sourmash gather results.
    plot_gather_upset()
    Visualize the intersection of genome accessions in sourmash gather results from many samples
    plot_signatures_rarefaction()
    Plot a rarefaction curve to determine sequence saturation
    plot_signatures_upset()
    Visualize the intersection of minhashes in sourmash signatures from many samples
    plot_taxonomy_annotate_sankey()
    Visualize a sankey diagram from taxonomic lineages from one or many samples
    plot_taxonomy_annotate_ts_alluvial()
    Visualize an allivual flow plot from taxonomic lineages from one or many samples
    plot_taxonomy_annotate_upset()
    Visualize an upset plot of taxonomic lineage intersections between samples
    read_compare_csv()
    Read a CSV file output by sourmash compare
    read_gather()
    Read CSV file or files output by sourmash gather
    read_signature()
    Read sourmash signature or signatures into a dataframe
    read_signature_one()
    Read one sourmash signature into a dataframe
    read_taxonomy_annotate()
    Read CSV file or files output by sourmash taxonomy annotate
    tax_glom_taxonomy_annotate()
    Agglomerate counts of same lineage to specified level of taxonomy.
    warning_handler()
    Warning handler to suppress warning message that contains "The following named parsers don't match the column names:"

    Developed by Taylor Reiter.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
